issue.title: System plugin loading issue since gazebo-current 2.2.2-1~precise

content.raw:
A simplified version of the plugin (only removed unrelated code), can be found as catkin package [gazebo_mis](https://github.com/andreasBihlmaier/gazebo_mis).

Here is the relevant part of my .launch file:
```
  <!-- start gazebo server-->
  <node name="gazebo" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="$(arg script_type)" respawn="false" output="screen"
	  args="$(arg command_arg1) $(arg command_arg2) -s libGazeboMISServerPlugin.so $(arg world_name)" />
	
  <!-- start gazebo client -->
  <group if="$(arg gui)">
    <node name="gazebo_gui" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="gzclient" respawn="false" output="screen"
    	args="-g libGazeboMISGuiPlugin.so" />
  </group>
```
content.html:
A simplified version of the plugin (only removed unrelated code), can be found as catkin package gazebo_mis.

Here is the relevant part of my .launch file:

  <!-- start gazebo server-->
  <node name="gazebo" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="$(arg script_type)" respawn="false" output="screen"
      args="$(arg command_arg1) $(arg command_arg2) -s libGazeboMISServerPlugin.so $(arg world_name)" />

  <!-- start gazebo client -->
  <group if="$(arg gui)">
    <node name="gazebo_gui" pkg="gazebo_ros" type="gzclient" respawn="false" output="screen"
        args="-g libGazeboMISGuiPlugin.so" />
  </group>
